citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 507PM on
19-Jun-17.
Spoke with licensee by phone at 5:07pm as she was leaving for an appointment.
